# delegate

**Instance Property**

The custom object you use to provide PDF data for a screenshot.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor weak var delegate: (any UIScreenshotServiceDelegate)? { get set }
```

## Discussion

Assign an object to this property early in the life cycle of your window scene. The object must conform to the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIScreenshotServiceDelegate] protocol.

## Responding to screenshot requests

- **UIScreenshotServiceDelegate**: Methods you use to generate PDF data that accompanies a user-requested screenshot.
